    • The '`last_`' family of functions

The '`last_`' family of functions

Source: vignettes/last_family.Rmd
last_family.Rmd
library(financr)

This vignette is about the ‘last_’ functions such as financr::last_indices() and financr::last_crypto() that offers the latest financial values (‘USD’) of more than 40 world-indices and 100 crypto-currencies, respectively.

last_indices() return a data.frame with the latest financial value of major world financial indices.

indices <- last_indices()
str(indices)
#> 'data.frame':    41 obs. of  7 variables:
#>  $ symbol        : chr  "^GSPC" "^DJI" "^IXIC" "^NYA" ...
#>  $ name          : chr  "S&P 500" "Dow Jones Industrial Average" "NASDAQ Composite" "NYSE COMPOSITE (DJ)" ...
#>  $ price         : num  5074 38315 15588 17619 4608 ...
#>  $ change        : num  -322 -2231 -963 -1149 -308 ...
#>  $ change_percent: num  -5.97 -5.5 -5.82 -6.12 -6.27 ...
#>  $ volume        : num  6.05e+09 1.29e+09 9.14e+09 0.00 0.00 ...
#>  $ currency      : chr  "USD" "USD" "USD" "USD" ...
#>  - attr(*, "n.currencies")= int 1
#>  - attr(*, "currencies")= chr "USD"
#>  - attr(*, "date")= Date[1:1], format: "2025-04-06"
#>  - attr(*, "crypto")= logi FALSE

last_crypto() return a data.frame of 100 crypto-currencies values in USD ($).

krypt <- last_crypto()
str(krypt)
#> 'data.frame':    100 obs. of  13 variables:
#>  $ symbol                          : chr  "BTC-USD" "ETH-USD" "USDT-USD" "XRP-USD" ...
#>  $ name                            : chr  "Bitcoin USD" "Ethereum USD" "Tether USDt USD" "XRP USD" ...
#>  $ price                           : num  7.93e+04 1.62e+03 9.99e-01 1.99 5.55e+02 ...
#>  $ change                          : num  -3.76e+03 -1.74e+02 -2.00e-04 -1.40e-01 -3.71e+01 ...
#>  $ change_percent                  : num  -4.53 -9.71 -0.02 -6.55 -6.27 -0.01 -9.87 -9.78 -1.84 -9.41 ...
#>  $ market_cap                      : num  1.57e+12 1.95e+11 1.44e+11 1.16e+11 7.91e+10 ...
#>  $ volume                          : num  2.33e+10 1.51e+10 5.27e+10 3.08e+09 1.27e+09 ...
#>  $ volume_in_currency_24hr         : num  2.33e+10 1.51e+10 5.27e+10 3.08e+09 1.27e+09 ...
#>  $ total_volume_all_currencies_24hr: num  2.33e+10 1.51e+10 5.27e+10 3.08e+09 1.27e+09 ...
#>  $ circulating_supply              : num  1.98e+07 1.21e+08 1.44e+11 5.83e+10 1.42e+08 ...
#>  $ x52_wk_change_percent           : num  20.39 -47.71 -0.03 260.39 1.54 ...
#>  $ from                            : chr  "BTC" "ETH" "USDT" "XRP" ...
#>  $ to                              : chr  "USD" "USD" "USD" "USD" ...
#>  - attr(*, "n.currencies")= int 101
#>  - attr(*, "currencies")= chr [1:101] "BTC" "ETH" "USDT" "XRP" ...
#>  - attr(*, "exchange")= chr [1:100] "BTC => USD" "ETH => USD" "USDT => USD" "XRP => USD" ...
#>  - attr(*, "date")= Date[1:1], format: "2025-04-06"
#>  - attr(*, "crypto")= logi TRUE
